attributes.action: Albright Newton to pm G. Brown and Mr Edwards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir G Brown,
 This is Albright Newton, and I am asking to email me about the global warming agreement paper. I do not know the financial status of your goverment found but I would like you to say how much you would like to offer for the project,because the next fight I need to face is the bacteria which is going to be a world wide swapt. If I get the money from the project my work there can quickly begin before it is too late. Sir these bacteria is mounting every treatment so far. What am I going to do? first need the money to get the equipment to work with to show the best solution. Not only that but I also have the cure for some cancer and more deadly sickness. How did I geather these cure by God Almighty. I keenly ask sir please work with me thanks.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
